#id=1
#text=A few weeks ago , I took a bath .
#id=2
#text=I do not normally take baths , instead I take showers , but I had the house to myself .
#id=3
#text=My back was hurting and I wanted to relax with some heat on it .
#id=4
#text=I start out cleaning up the bathtub .
#id=5
#text=It is not dirty really , but I want the tub to be spotless if I am going to be taking a bath .
#id=6
#text=I first took a quick shower to get everything washed off and clean .
#id=7
#text=I did n't want to sit in a tepid pool of my own fifth .
#id=8
#text=After that was finished , I turned on the hot water and filled the tub .
#id=9
#text=I like to have a really hot bath , because it generally gets cold so quick .
#text=I found some of my daughter 's bubble bath and added a pretty generous amount .
#text=I figured , Hey , you have to treat yourself right .
#text=So , I got it and folded a towel for my head and laid down .
#text=I had a beer while I was relaxing in the tub .
#text=My back was loosening up and I was feeling better after about fifteen minutes .
#text=The water was getting cold , so I decided to get out .
#text=I dried off and got dressed and I felt a lot better .
